text: 21.32: Lu 3.12 naŋga, 7.29-30Jon narɨ kɨyɨmarañɨ yɨvurahata narɨŋ tɨtɨtɨ vana taya isɨhuramami, hara nuŋɨrɨm maŋindarɨmaŋgaramara. Kru gavaman ndamarɨm tɨmbahɨrɨs mɨŋamɨŋa haŋɨnɨŋ, naŋga navundi kru mɨŋavɨŋgɨrɨvɨŋgɨrɨ haŋɨnɨŋ nɨŋambirɨm indarɨmaŋgaramu. Kandɨhamata vana andɨhu ŋgamara, hara narɨŋandɨ indarɨmit hambu tɨvɨrahi nɨŋambirɨm maŋindarɨmaŋgaramara, vami.
